subject: Throttle pedal loosening bolt during normal iss
description_text:
Hello,

I purchased my Simsonn pedals on 9/24/2025.
Over the last ~2 weeks, a bolt at the bottom of the throttle pedal has been
repeatedly backing out during normal use.
This has not occurred previously and now requires frequent re-tightening.
I wanted to ask whether this is a known issue, if updated hardware exists,
or if there is a recommended permanent solution.

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Zeke Weaver,       Could you please provide a few photos to help us better understand the current situation?
On Mon, Jan 12, 2026 at 8:34 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Zeke Weaver,  You can try applying a small amount of threadlocker (e.g., medium-strength/blue) to the screw threads and tighten it again.
